description: A web application front-end for visualizing and browsing databases and their tables, including dynamically loading database schema and data, with interactive UI elements.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and populates sidebar

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database to show tables

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads data for a specific table and renders it

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs HTML table from data array

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates a cell HTML with special handling for long/complex data

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long or complex data
